mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs John M. Kelley and James O. Kelley
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs John M. Kelley and James O. Kelley Offense: Assault and Battery Victim: Thomas B. Stump Complainant: Thomas Noah Wilson Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 06.29.1887 Guilty: James O. Kelly, Fine:$2.50 Not guilty: John M. Kelley, Dismissed
